html:
5.19.23  4:13 pm   favorite element on the periodic table?

      i like the lines in between the elements. very thin, yet secure

5.19.23  2:23 pm   Any advice on how to end songs?

     it's definitely impossible, but you can still invent a way. all you have to do is get your head around the fact that the song was playing just a moment ago, but after this moment it won't be

      I realized I have all these unfinished recordings and notes of songs that I wish I could fully finish but moved on from cause I just didn't really know where to take it. Maybe the problem is my "choruses" (if you could even call them that) don't sound very chorus-y.

     that probably has nothing to do with it, and you surely don't even have to call that a chorus

     Like they don't resolve (lyrically or melodically), so I can't just end the song on the chorus like a standard pop song,

     what on earth is a standard pop song

     or it simply sounds unfinished.. idk if that makes sense 

     have you tried interrupting it with a breaking emergency news broadcast explaining exactly how many seconds can be found in each minute

5.19.23  2:22 pm   What are your deep-seated reactions to the standard model of particle physics?

      i tend to get even more deeply seated, into the seat

5.19.23  12:38 pm   where can i find a walkman

      try radio shack

5.19.23  11:45 am   can i unlock creative mode

      it's only halfway locked. you'll have to work around that

5.19.23  9:52 am   I was wondering something about Bill, is Bill a four-lettered word?

      i will have to count them sometime

5.19.23  9:33 am   whats "not" steves actual name, be serious =

      that's up to you. it's choose your own adventure

5.19.23  9:01 am   i cant read how you write sheet music

      that's ok. if we were working together we would find another way

5.19.23  7:01 am   has posting on youtube changed the way you come up with ideas?

      no

5.18.23  9:57 pm   Is normal weird or is weird normal?

      both simultaneously, but only sometimes

5.18.23  8:04 pm   How do you get rid of anxiety 

      get a standard size piece of paper and put the anxiety onto the paper. hang it on the fridge, and then move to a different part of town

5.18.23  5:47 pm   Why is the questions page stuck on Mario day? Is it because you love mario

      it's not love, it's just lust

5.18.23  5:13 pm   favorite word in the English language?

      poit

5.18.23  4:54 pm   Hey!! How do you approach improvising? Your harmony is beyond A-tier; trying to get better at improvising myself (jazz and other styles)

      each moment in time is like a multi-prong multi-directional fork in the timeline of your life. to start off, just sit there and enjoy the ridiculous view

5.18.23  4:21 pm   thoughts on nepal

      "it's always there"

5.18.23  1:52 pm   How did you get such a big brain

      just stack 2 brains together, with a 3rd brain in between to figure out which one to believe

5.18.23  12:26 pm   Do you know me

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.18.23  12:24 pm   one time i submitted something on here complimenting one of your songs. however i accidently sent it TWICE, and im worried it seemed superficial because of that.

     if the same identical message was sent twice, i probably didn't even see the second one. and if it was phrased differently, i don't imagine it could sound superficial

     should i feel like a fool for this

      i gotta check the fool rules on that one

5.18.23  11:30 am   What existed of "if the world doesn't end" before "9 8 7" was released?

      nothing

5.18.23  11:18 am   do you have any old demos of songs, and if so would you release them so we can see into your creative process?

     sometimes

     I guess I'm also asking if you are willing to do behind the scenes videos,some artists that I like do them and I find them fascinating. - Deme

      yes i will do that

5.18.23  11:16 am   knock onock

      are you sure that's a door

5.18.23  10:46 am   adding a question mark to the end of a statement makes it a question?

      in most cases yes, but in this case actually yes also

5.18.23  10:30 am   bill why do i only see responses made in march and before right now in this questions page. did the recent questions get deleted?

      no they were just resting

5.18.23  9:53 am   at what age did you start music?

      about 1 and a half

5.18.23  9:22 am   how to be natural?

      maybe you could entirely digitize yourself. that should do the trick

5.18.23  7:47 am   where is the school

      no school is anywhere

5.18.23  6:42 am   how to live?

      just switch everything. that's the life of a thing switcher

5.18.23  4:50 am   Are you a programmer too?

      sometimes

5.18.23  3:49 am   How do you answer all our questions without losing sleep?

     that's easy. i skip most of them

     Do you have some sort of question answering machine, that spits out some words you would say?

      no, but i have 2 books of words: "the dictionary" and another book with everything else

5.18.23  3:44 am   What keyboard do you use in the songs for the video 'Hi i'm steve'?

      i wonder if you would still want to know, if you knew that the sounds don't come from the keyboard, and, not only that, the song doesn't even come from the sounds

5.18.23  2:25 am   how do you deal with escapism?

      leave a trail of bread crumbs

5.18.23  2:24 am   how do i not be sad and angry all the time

      try to be sad and angry all simultaneously at just 1 time

5.18.23  1:42 am   does good music make up for bad lyrics

      is a thing taller than another thing?

5.18.23  12:25 am   would you go on a podcast with tim and/or eric? i would like to see that

      i'd have to have a 4th person sit between tim and eric. the power of their friendship intimidates me

5.17.23  11:46 pm   can i have a song to listen to, bill approved 

      almost, except you need to provide a seed of context. otherwise, technically no song is approvable. the correct contextless recommendation is all of them

5.17.23  11:35 pm   do you like red or blue better

      that's not important right now

5.17.23  11:11 pm   how to choose

      point to one of them

5.17.23  9:24 pm   Did you ever finish trolling the 2011 book?

      trolling probably meant something different back then, but indeed i did

5.17.23  9:22 pm   what are your thoughts on things?

      there should be a little pouch for them

5.17.23  9:00 pm   what's your favorite kind of flower?

      surprise me

5.17.23  8:49 pm   what to do if there's a bear chasing you

      try a 'reverse mortgage'. those things are crazy

5.17.23  8:32 pm   thoughts on gill sans ultra bold

      not bold enough

5.17.23  7:01 pm   Best piano piece you've ever heard?

      it got cursed after someone claimed it was the best. i'm not making that mistake again

5.17.23  6:35 pm   should i go where i am, or where i aren't?

      alternate between both, repeatedly

5.17.23  5:44 pm   difference between Eb7b9sus4 and C#min6/Eb?

     on paper, with no context, i see the same notes

     if there is none then how should i spell it in the context of Emaj7 |G7 |Cmaj7 |?, key of E major i think

      if you want that Ab note, then use Eb7b9sus4. because otherwise a player might not assume that note is so important

5.17.23  5:42 pm    

      i understand

5.17.23  5:41 pm   what's your opinion on  J E S U S

      a version of 'bingo' for when you are just a little more turnt

5.17.23  5:39 pm   favorite note

      low A (27.5)

5.17.23  5:31 pm   How can you tell if a book is fiction or non-fiction?

     see if it comes true

5.17.23  3:42 pm   what are the chords under "no, i didn't know that" in rabbit?

     Dbmaj7, Abmaj9. except the C note might have been skipped, in the second chord
